message: Let's be fair and split it close to half, I get a bit more since I started!
I think a 55/45 split is a good compromise, since we both get more than a straight half. Let's be practical and get this done.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet closer to the middle ground, 58 for me is a good deal for both
Let's split it 53/47. I'm coming down a bit, and I'm hoping you'll meet me halfway. We both get closer to what we want.
I see we're getting closer, I'll come down a bit from 58, 57 is a good number for me, let's settle
I'm willing to go even lower, 51/49 is my final offer. Let's end this and get our share.
You said 51/49 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it, 56 is still a good deal for both of us
Let's just split it evenly, 50/50. We're running out of time, and this is the fairest way to divide the money.
